content:
ActorRemotingProviderAttribute.CreateServiceRemotingListener Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Remoting
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

In this Article

Creates a service remoting listener for remoting the actor interfaces.

public abstract Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Runtime.IServiceRemotingListener CreateServiceRemotingListener (Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Runtime.ActorService actorService);
Parameters
actorService
ActorService

The implementation of the actor service that hosts the actors whose interfaces needs to be remoted.

Returns
IServiceRemotingListener

An IServiceRemotingListener for the specified actor service.
